game_description: ‚ÄúThe most unique stealth action game I‚Äôve ever played‚Äù ‚Äì VR Oasis ‚ÄúTactical kayak action ‚Äì genius‚Äù ‚Äì Destructoid ‚ÄúPure VR Stealth‚Äù ‚Äì AusGamers You are a Phantom: an elite covert operative with one night to prevent all-out war. Dispatched into hostile wetlands in your military kayak, utilize weapons and equipment to neutralize enemies. Engage targets lethally or infiltrate unnoticed from the shadows across a full campaign. This is stealth action redefined. DEADLIER ON WATER - Discover innovative VR traversal using your military kayak to freely and stealthily move across the water. BECOME A PHANTOM - Experience the tension of becoming a lethal military asset ‚Äì everything is 1:1, delivering a new level of immersion. STEALTH ACTION - Sneak beneath enemy walkways, or ambush hostiles in exhilarating combat. ADDITIONAL FEATURES - Multiple modes, unlockables, achievements and more. OCULUS OPTIMIZED - Cross-buy, cross-save, cross-play, and Link support.
Languages: English, English (US), English (UK), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Spanish (Mexico)
review_1: I got this game the instant it came out on Quest. The fact that this game had 0 DLCs and not a second game hurt me. The story was good, long game play, good sounds, mechanics. This game did something that not many can do and it had it all minus the NPCs can be dumb lol but it was so fun. If there was a game exactly like this but on land, same mechanics and all, I‚Äôd love it.
